segments.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato mātugāmo ekantaamanāpo hoti purisassa.
segments.en: “Mendicants, when a female has five factors she is extremely undesirable to a man.

segments.pli: Na ca rūpavā hoti, na ca bhogavā hoti, na ca sīlavā hoti, alaso ca hoti, pajañcassa na labhati—
segments.en: She’s not attractive, wealthy, or ethical; she’s idle, and she doesn’t beget children.

segments.pli: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato mātugāmo ekantaamanāpo hoti purisassa.
segments.en: When a female has these five factors she is extremely undesirable to a man.

segments.pli: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato mātugāmo ekantamanāpo hoti purisassa.
segments.en: When a female has five factors she is extremely desirable to a man.

segments.pli: Rūpavā ca hoti, bhogavā ca hoti, sīlavā ca hoti, dakkho ca hoti analaso, pajañcassa labhati—
segments.en: She’s attractive, wealthy, and ethical; she’s skillful and tireless, and she begets children.

segments.pli: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato mātugāmo ekantamanāpo hoti purisassā”ti.
segments.en: When a female has these five factors she is extremely desirable to a man.”
